rules: Rule1: If artwork1 is scheduled, then artwork1 is delivered.
Rule2: Either driver1 is assigned or driver2 is assigned.
Rule3: Whenever driver2 is assigned, and if the condition that system1 is not powered on implies vehicle1 is not functional, then vehicle1 is not operational, and consequently artwork1 is scheduled.
Rule4: Should route1 be approved, then route1 is optimized.

Rule5: In the event that route1 is optimized, and driver1 is assigned, then if it is not the case that system1 not powered on leads to vehicle1 not functional, vehicle1 is not operational, and thus artwork1 is scheduled.
Rule6: Provided that system1 is deployed, system1 is tracking.
Rule7: Under the condition that system1 is deployed, system1 is connected.
Rule8: In the event that system1 is active, system1 is powered on.
Rule9: Provided that system1 is monitoring, system1 is active.
Rule10: Either system1 is malfunctioning or, if system1 is tracking, then system1 is monitoring.
Rule11: Artwork1 is stolen or, if system1 is not powered on, then artwork1 is not damaged.
Rule12: In the event that person1 is verified, and if system1 is not powered on, then artwork1 is accessible.
Rule13: Provided that person1 has a background check completed, and if person1 is authorized, then person1 is verified.
Rule14: Either person1 has a background check completed or person1 has training complete.
Rule15: Artwork1 has restricted access or, if person1 has training complete, then provided person1 is authorized, person1 is verified.
Rule16: If manager1 is notified, and if it is not the case that system1 not powered on implies artwork1 not damaged, then vehicle1 is not repaired, which leads to artwork1 being rerouted.

Rule17: Provided that manager1 is alerted, and if the condition that system1 not powered on does not lead to artwork1 not damaged, then vehicle1 is not repaired, and consequently artwork1 is rerouted.
Rule18: Should an email be sent to manager1, then manager1 is notified.
Rule19: Either an email is sent to manager1 or an SMS is sent to manager1.
Rule20: In the event that an SMS is sent to manager1, then manager1 is alerted.

Rule21: Under the condition that technology1 has a system update, and if route1 is approved, and driver1 is assigned, then if the fact that system1 not powered on does not imply vehicle1 not functional, vehicle1 is not operational, and hence artwork1 is scheduled.
Rule22: Provided that a patch is available for technology1, and if technology1 is updated, then technology1 is not outdated.
Rule23: Either a patch is available for technology1 or technology1 has a manual update.
Rule24: Whenever technology1 has a manual update, and if technology1 is updated, then technology1 is not outdated.
Rule25: Provided that artwork1 is validated, then artwork1 is scheduled.
Rule26: In the event that artwork1 is scanned, and if artwork1 is confirmed, then artwork1 is validated.
Rule27: If artwork1 is genuine, then artwork1 is fake.
Rule28: Should artwork1 be genuine, then artwork1 is not fake.
Rule29: Whenever artwork1 is packaged, then artwork1 is delivered.

Rule30: Provided that system1 is an automated process, and if it is not the case that system1 not powered on does not lead to vehicle1 not functional, then vehicle1 is not operational, and artwork1 is not packaged, which implies artwork1 is shipped.
Rule31: Either system1 is an automated process or person1 is a manual process.

Rule32: Under the condition that person1 is a supervised process, and if it is not the case that system1 not powered on does not result in vehicle1 not functional, then vehicle1 is not operational, and artwork1 is not packaged, hence artwork1 is shipped.
Rule33: Provided that artwork1 is finalized, then artwork1 is processed.
Rule34: Whenever artwork1 is insured, and if artwork1 is authenticated, and if artwork1 is recovered, then artwork1 is not stolen.
Rule35: Should artwork1 be processed, then artwork1 is completed.
Rule36: If vehicle1 is tested, then vehicle1 is certified.
Rule37: Under the condition that vehicle1 is certified, and if system1 is not powered on, then vehicle1 is not functional.
Rule38: Should system1 be communicating, then system1 is active.
Rule39: Whenever system1 is in normal operation, then either system1 is in emergency mode or, if system1 is deployed, then system1 is communicating.
Rule40: If system1 is stable, then system1 is not in a warning state.
Rule41: Provided that system1 has GPS enabled, and if system1 is deployed, then system1 is active.
Rule42: In the event that system1 has a strong signal, and if system1 does not have GPS enabled, then the location of system1 is unknown.
Rule43: Either system1 has a strong signal or system1 has a weak signal.
Rule44: Under the condition that system1 has a weak signal, and if system1 does not have GPS enabled, then the location of system1 is unknown.
Rule45: Should it be false that person1 being a manual process leads to person1 being a supervised process, then artwork1 is finalized.
Rule46: If the implication that system1 connected leads to system1 powered on does not hold, then system1 is not offline.
Rule47: Whenever it is not the case that system1 connected implying system1 powered on leads to system1 being offline, then system1 has a sync error.
Rule48: In the event that the condition where system1 connected does not imply system1 powered on does not result in system1 being offline, then system1 does not have a sync error.
Rule49: Should the scenario where system1 not powered on does not lead to artwork1 not damaged not result in vehicle1 not repaired, then artwork1 is not rerouted.
Rule50: Under the condition that system1 not powered on does not result in vehicle1 not functional, then vehicle1 is not operational, and hence artwork1 is confirmed.
Rule51: Should it not be the case that artwork1 not scanned leads to artwork1 being counterfeit, then artwork1 is genuine.
Rule52: If system1 not powered on does not imply artwork1 not damaged, then vehicle1 is repaired.
Rule53: In the event that system1 not powered on does not result in vehicle1 not functional, then vehicle1 is operational.
Rule54: Should technology1 not have a system update, then technology1 is outdated.
Rule55: If technology1 does not have a system update, then technology1 is updated.
Rule56: In the event that artwork1 is not insured, then artwork1 is lost.
Rule57: Under the condition that system1 is not in normal operation, then system1 is in a warning state.
Rule58: Should system1 not be stable, then system1 is unstable.
Rule59: If system1 does not have GPS enabled, then the location of system1 is not unknown.
Rule60: Whenever system1 is not powered on, then artwork1 is damaged.
Rule61: Under the condition that system1 is not powered on, then vehicle1 is functional.
Rule62: Provided that system1 is not powered on, then artwork1 is not accessible.
facts: Fact8: Artwork1 does not have restricted access.
Fact12: System1 is not in emergency mode.
